Question
========
Which repository template is used to start the portfolio project?

Answerlist
----------
* A random empty repository
* The Quarto source code repository
* The online-portfolio-template on GitHub
* A private template created on your local machine

Solution
========
The unit uses the online-portfolio-template repository on GitHub.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* False
* True
* False
